findings.title: KEX-29:Incompatibility With Deflationary Tokens
findings.description: Incompatibility with deflationary tokens due to potential logical issue.

findings.title: KEX-1:A malicious early user/attacker can manipulate the vault
findings.description: A malicious early user/attacker can manipulate the vault's share pricePerShare to take an unfair share of future users' deposits
